titleStmt.title: Merie tales of the made men of Gotam gathered to gether by A.B. of phisike doctour.
Merry tales of the mad men of Gotham.
titleStmt.author: Boorde, Andrew, 1490?-1549.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London in Fletstret, beneath the Conduit, at the signe of S. John euangelist, by Thomas Colwell,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Andrew Boorde--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imprint taken from colophon; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: London in Fletstret, beneath the Conduit, at the signe of S. John euangelist
